channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Scientists capture emotional footage of predator returning to fire-ravaged forest: 'Means everything to me'
‘The world has changed’ Starmer tells energy summit
Scientists make unexpected discovery about health impacts of common recreation equipment: 'The first reliable data'
Lebanon reprimands Iran envoy over comments on Hezbollah disarmament
What to know about common heart defect as Emma Willis undergoes surgery
Federal judge temporarily blocks Trump’s push to end DEI in K-12 public schools
item.description: A federal judge has temporarily blocked the Trump administration’s guidance forbidding diversity, equity and inclusion efforts in K-12 public schools.

item.title: Trump "not happy" with Russian strikes on Kyiv: "Vladimir, STOP!"
item.description: President Trump called Thursday's strikes "very bad timing," as he wants Russia and Ukraine to reach a peace deal.

item.title: 'Vladimir, STOP!' Trump says after deadliest Russian strike on Kyiv in months
item.description: Russian attack drones and ballistic missiles struck the capital, according to the Kyiv City Military Administration.

item.title: Jelly Roll hopeful correcting past mistakes will urge governor to pardon him
item.description: Country music star Jelly Roll says he wants to share his message of hope and redemption with others, but says his criminal record is complicating his ...

item.title: Larkin's War | Sunday on 60 Minutes
item.description: Navy SEAL Ryan Larkin took his own life after tours in Iraq and Afghanistan. His father suspected there was more to his suicide than depression. 60 Mi...

item.title: From banning tech to ending sister-city ties, US states have at least 240 anti-China proposals
Highland Park shooter sentenced to life in prison for killing 7, injuring dozens
item.description: Crimo was sentenced to seven consecutive life sentences on Thursday for killing seven people and injuring dozens in the July 4, 2022, mass shooting.

item.title: Most Americans expect higher prices as a result of Trump’s tariffs, a new AP-NORC poll finds
Venezuelan man in Detroit deported after wrong turn at Ambassador Bridge
item.description: A 32-year-old Venezuelan man reportedly took a wrong turn onto the Ambassador Bridge, crossing into Canada, while delivering food back in January, and...

item.title: WATCH: Woodpecker wreaks havoc in Massachusetts neighborhood
item.description: Residents of tranquil Rockport, Massachusetts, were in search of a menace who was leaving car windows cracked. Turns out it was a pileated woodpecker.

item.title: Trump admin live updates: Trump to meet with 'Atlantic' editor invited to Signal chat
item.description: President Donald Trump claimed on Truth Social that he was going to meet with "The Atlantic" editor-in-chief Jeffrey Goldberg on Thursday.

item.title: Judge issues temporary order to keep detained Columbia student in Vermont
item.description: Mohsen Mahdawi was arrested by ICE during a citizenship interview last week.

item.title: Gunmen torch vehicles across Mexico as cartel turf war rages
item.description: The Jalisco New Generation cartel was designated a terrorist organization by U.S. President Donald Trump in February.
